name: Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master!
name_original: Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master!
description:
In Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master, you can drum along and ride into the rhythm with Taiko no Tatsujin’s iconic note characters, Don-chan and Katsu-chan, lighting their drumming spirit on fire!

Get ready to be challenged with performing an extensive library of over 70 songs, ranging from classical to popular hits including, Homura, Into the Night, and MEGALOVANIA.

Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master supports local multiplayer matches for up to two players. Reach euphoric levels of rhythmic synchronicity by performing cooperatively or compete head-to-head for the highest score in Score Battle mode! Additionally, you can compete in Ranked Matches, pitting yourself against other players in 1 vs. 1 performance battles to take a spot on the Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master online global leaderboard and see who is the best Taiko no Tatsujin drummer in the world.

Lastly, as you progress in the game, you will be able to acquire custom avatars and costumes for Don-chan, showing off your unique personality and accomplishments to players around the world.
